Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Patients with New York Heart Association classes II to IV CHF and left ventricular ejection fractions of no greater than 0 . 30 ( n = 3164 ) were randomized and followed up for a median of 46 months .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| New York Heart Association classes II to IV CHF |
| left ventricular ejection fractions of no greater than 0 . 30 |

In this paragraph, the two disease entities mentioned are "New York Heart Association classes II to IV CHF" and "left ventricular ejection fractions of no greater than 0 . 30". The first entity refers to a classification system for heart failure patients, while the second entity refers to a measure of heart function.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| New York Heart Association classes II to IV CHF |

In this revised list, the only clear disease entity mentioned is "New York Heart Association classes II to IV CHF". While "left ventricular ejection fractions" is a measure of heart function, it does not in itself refer to a specific disease.
